duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform pre-trip inspections on vehicles to ensure safe transportation and prevent unnecessary maintenance.
Properly strap down loads on trailers to secure them for transportation.
Physically capable of climbing on trailers and tarping loads.
Be on time for pick-ups and deliveries, and maintain a presentable and respectful demeanor while dealing with customers and coworkers.
Drive a truck for long periods of time while staying within ELD guidelines and communicating any issues that may arise with a load or equipment.
Maintain a clean vehicle and equipment.
